stages.name: first-stage
stages.task: Create a simple text file called TEST-OUTPUT.txt in the current directory with the content: 'Test workflow executed successfully at ' followed by the current date and time.

stages.name: second-stage
stages.task: Read the TEST-OUTPUT.txt file created in the first stage. Append a new line with the text: 'Second stage completed successfully.' Save the updated content back to the same file.
